Text:
Sorry mate, stand back and examine the logic behind putting an analogue vinyl source on here in flac lossless..........doesn't make sense to me.
It polutes a digital collection of files with analogue crap.
If it wasn't widely available OK, but both 7'' & 12'' versions are easy to find, all digital.
Just uploaded it in proper 100% all digital flac lossless if anyone wants a decent non-analogue copy

Thanks for this one...
Some of us still appreciate the fullness of analog..
I, for one, love vinyl rips...
Keep up the good work!
SG
Wow what a Tune can go agest SNAP and M.a.R.s

Everyone who knows about audio know that vinyl has a frequency range (bass) better than CD. And lossless = no cut frequency (like mp3 or ugly wma).
I love a REAL RIP (taken from original media).
I will download and check.
Man, thank you for this torrent.
